title: Bloomberg Markets: Bannert-Thurner on 'The Machine Equation'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bannert-Thurner on 'The Machine Equation'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Valerie Bannert-Thurner Head:Risk & Surveillance Solutions Nasdaq Inc Discussing financial firms integrating machine learning and artificial intelligence capabilities to help build and protect assets from the Bloomberg Invest New York Summit.
